line_1: And grows, in short, the very thing he wou'd:
line_2: Turns downright sharper, lives by sucking blood,

line_1: So if you durst, you'd say all Women would.
line_2: And 'cause you have made Whores of all you could,

line_1: So great's mans ambition that he would
line_2: Have all the wealth and power if he could,

line_1: What uses of his boon the Giver would.
line_2: If this be plain, 'tis plainly understood

line_1: SO stood the doubtful Youth a-while; nor wou'd
line_2: Forsake the Evil, nor pursue the Good;

line_1: "But see! — from thee he shrinks, nor would
line_2: Ah, though my EDWIN spilt thy blood,

line_1: "But see, from thee he shrinks! nor would
line_2: "Ah, tho' my EDWIN spilt thy blood,

line_1: And grant the bad what happiness they wou'd,
line_2: One they must want, which is, to pass for good.

line_1: CAMPBELL foretold, just what he wou'd,
line_2: And left the Stars to make it good,

line_1: I Clasps him, just as meeting Lovers wou'd,
line_2: That had the stings of Absence understood:
